body.name: 6 Drawer Double Dresser.Wood Dressers & chests of Drawers for Storage and Organization for Bedroom,Closet,Living Room,Hallway.47.2" D x 15.5" W x 29.5" H.White.
features: Super Storage Space:This bedroom dresser size:47.2"L x 15.5" W x 29.5" H. each drawer size:20" L x12" W x5.5" H large deep drawers to store and sort clothes, books,towels, linens, toys and other essentials,The middle open cabinet can hold hair dryers, and other common items.to help keep the room neat, tidy and organized.the solid top of this dresser can be used as a TV cabinet and perfect for displaying photos, bouquets, potted plant, lamps, candlesticks, vases and abstract decorations.

Sturdy Frame-High-Quality materials:This bedroom dressers made from Sturdy wood and Its solid construction and quality materials make it a reliable storage solution. with a sturdy frame could support up to 220lbs on the top and 30lbs for each drawer.The high-quality water-resistant finish can be easily cleaned and maintained to ensure a prolonged life.

Stylish Desingn：This dresser with 6 drawers are equipped with sliding rail,Very smooth with minimal drag and noise, Anti-rewind design prevents tipping, stable and safe.easy-to-pull plastic handle are quite stylish and durable to use.

Multi-Functional use: The dresser Chest of drawers can be integrated into different scenes, such as bedrooms, living rooms, offices, closets, hallway, entryway, nurseries,playrooms, etc. The dresser also used can be used as TV stand.

Easy Installation and Service:The package has detailed instructions, follow the steps in the instructions, then arrange each board by number.We have professional Online Customer Services and Phone Call Services available, please contact us directly if you have any questions, and we will solve your problem.
body.description: Wooden Farmhouse 6 Drawers Dresser Combinates of modern and farmhouse style, adding character and charm to your bedroom and living room. Explore infinite possibilities with 6 drawer dresser, you will be surprised. Manage at least 80 socks, 60 shirts, 50 pants, 80 Towels and etc. Available in all home scenes and help you store all potential stuff. Easy Assembly: With numbered parts and detailed instructions, you can have this dresser assembled in no time without sacrificing your leisure time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it so much, I bought a 2nd one!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these nightstands to replace my big bulky ones. I tend to collect things on my nightstands, so I was hoping by having less surface area, less junk would collect. They are so much smaller, it has taken some getting used to, but they are amazing. The color is beautiful, the light feature is fun (you can have a disco party by syncing your light to your music), there are several plug and USB port options, and the drawers are just the right size. They're perfect for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is very sturdy and makes a great furniture piece in my bedroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid nightstand with a couple of flaws.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. When the stand arrived for assembly, the first thing I noticed is that it was quite heavy. I was expecting a solid construction due to the weight, and I wasn’t disappointed. The nightstand is mostly well made. Like many dressers made these days it’s a type of compression/fiber board that is wrapped in the wood-looking finish.For the most part I’m impressed with the quality of the materials. It did take quite a bit of assembly, but the instructions were clear enough and I have built furniture like this before, so it was relatively straightforward.A couple of complaints: The screws for the drawer rails are short and don’t have big threads, so they barely gripped into the particle board. A couple of them stripped through the wood even though I was gently using a hand screwdriver. Since this is on the drawer rails, they’ll be getting relatively regular use and could easily strip out. If you have some small wood screws with a heavier thread handy use those instead of the supplied ones. As you can see in the video they rattle right now, only because I couldn’t tighten the screws as some had stripped out in the holes.The other very odd and unfortunate design flaw is the USB plug for the lighting is supposed to go into one of the USB ports on top of the nightstand. You can see the white plug sticking up in the photos. This was a pretty ridiculous design decision since it looks weird and uses one of the two ports. Not a total deal breaker since you could just plug the USB lighting into the wall, but it was still just thoughtless design.Overall, this is still fairly well constructed and does look good. I hope they correct these two issues in the future, because this could have been a 5-star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Liked everything about it, just don't like putting things together. Very nice piece of furniture.
